data.title: Hope Cancer Support Centre
data.meta_description: The Centre provides emotional support to people affected by cancer including those who care for them, from the time of diagnosis, throughout treatment and afterwards.
data.text:
The Centre provides emotional support to people affected by cancer including those who care for them, from the time of diagnosis, throughout treatment and afterwards.

The Centre provides emotional support to people affected by cancer including those who care for them, from the time of diagnosis, throughout treatment and afterwards. This gentle and caring support takes place in a confidential, professional and non-judgmental environment. There is a variety of services available to all who attend the Hope Centre, including counselling, complimentary and creative therapies and children's services.

The underlying principle of Hope is that everyone is a unique individual with their own set of circumstances and will respond in their own way to the challenges that cancer brings.

We ensure a confidential, professional and caring service in a peaceful environment. All our services are free of charge.

Services we offer:

Counselling (one to one, couples, family), Reflexology, Gentle massage, Meditation, Exercise & Movement, Art plus art therapy Child& adolescent)Peer Support Groups, Bra/Prosthesis Fitting, Phone Support, Bereavement Support, Lymphoedema Manual Lymphatic Drainage, Climb Programme, Thrive & Survive Programme.
